name: pixelfin
description: Pixelfin is a self-hosted pixel art editor with layer support, palette tools, and export features. Designed for pixel artists, it works directly in the browser without external dependencies.
features: Pixel art editor: Create pixel art with drawing tools optimized for low-resolution artwork.
Layer support: Work with multiple layers for complex compositions and non-destructive editing.
Palette management: Create and manage color palettes with swatches for consistent artwork.
Export options: Save artwork in PNG, GIF, and other formats with configurable scaling.
Grid overlay: Display pixel grid for precise placement and alignment of individual pixels.
Drawing tools: Use pencil, line, rectangle, circle, and fill tools for efficient pixel placement.
Undo and redo: Navigate edit history with unlimited undo/redo for mistake-free creation.
Animation support: Create animated sprites with frame-by-frame animation tools.
Browser-based: Works entirely in the browser without plugins or external software installation.
Keyboard shortcuts: Speed up workflow with customizable keyboard shortcuts for common actions.
Zoom controls: Zoom in and out smoothly to work on details or view the full composition.
Project saving: Save and load projects to continue work across sessions.
